price: Anaasε wͻn na wͻ’bͻͻ soro ne asaase? Daabi, gye na wͻ’nnye nnie.
arabic: أَمۡ خَلَقُواْ ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضَۚ بَل لَّا يُوقِنُونَ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: am khalaqū al-samāwāti wal-arḍa bal lā yūqinūna
